name: Pranajeewa Suwa Dharani
short_description: Immune Enhancing Medicinal Drink for Covid 19
description: Specially mede herbal decoction against "Covid 19" to enhance immunity by using traditional ayurvedic text books for the program of the auspices of indigenous promotion, rural and ayurvedic hospital development and community health, approved by the ayurvedic department of health, an immune - enhancing drink for the COVID - 19 virus based on ancient indigenous prescription and treatment extracted from ancient ola booklets. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
